description: Blanks company memory — updated weekly to reflect major shifts, decisions, and values.

weekly_summaries.summary_content: Blanks TestFlight MVP nearly ready. Core UX and voice input working. App generation flow mostly functional. Key bottlenecks: LLM chaining inconsistency and slow Metro bundling on Render.
key_decisions: Use GPT-4.1 as primary codegen model with fallback to Claude
Block TestFlight rollout until Metro build time is under 30s
learnings: Even simple app requests (e.g., Hello World) can fail with too much model fallback logic
Users are excited by the orb interaction but confused post-recording

weekly_summaries.summary_content: App generation pipeline stabilized. Remixed apps tested. Added suggested edits and retry logic. Focus shifted toward shipping an emotionally delightful onboarding experience.
key_decisions: Keep the app fully voice-first, but allow optional text fallback
Delay sharing/discovery features until core generation UX is clean
learnings: Users need to feel progress during generation — otherwise, the magic breaks
Remix flow needs clear signposting — most testers didn’t understand what it was

long_term_goals: Launch Blanks publicly with a magical, voice-first experience
Enable anyone to create apps without knowing how to code
Evolve the orb into a central emotional UI anchor — a creative collaborator
Build a library of remixable mini-apps that feel like personal universes
